wiki.content:
"Turn Off the Light" peaked at #5 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100, and went to #1 on the U.S. Hot Dance Club Play chart in the Winter of 2001.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Turn Off the Light" peaked at #5 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100, and went to #1 on the U.S. Hot Dance Club Play chart in the Winter of 2001.

track.name: Turn Off the Light
comments: the guitar solo was pleasantly surprising. Heard the song for years, yet it's only now that I even notice it.
Yeah, missed this song.  Takes me back to some hangouts.
Almost 4got I loved this..Nelly's so beautiful & her voice is 2.
remind me of the good ol' days
OMG.. don't remember the last time i heard this, forgot how good it is
remind me of school days... )))) [2] Catchy song!!!!!!!!!
used to go to sleep to this when it first came out... glad last.fm reminded me of it... now it's back on the play list :)
I used to love this song when I was youn-OH WAIT, I still do.
